title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Gains 4.7% as All 20 Assets Trade Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Sui (SUI) Surged 18.5% and Aave (AAVE) gained 9.4% from Tuesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2759.21, up 4.7% (+124.59) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SUI (+18.5%) and AAVE (+9.4%).

Laggards: BCH (+0.8%) and LTC (+1.7%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index gained 4.7% with all 20 assets trading higher, led by SUI (+18.5%) and AAVE (+9.4%), indicating broad market strength and positive momentum.
